attributes.action: A general election to be held to choose a new British Priminister
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron has resigned, the government is falling apart, we the British public should have a say in who is fit to run Britain.. An election should be held for a new Priminister
attributes.background: We the British public recognise that our government are falling apart and leaving us in limbo, as a consequence the country is suffering from hate crime, we would like a general election to be held so we can choose a new Priminister fit to rule Britain.
